title: La Cousine Bette
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Honore de Balzac.
description: Cousine Bette is fast approaching 40 and hoping to marry a young man, Wenceslas, 20 years her senior, whose studies she is supporting financially. Upon learning that her trust and hopes have been betrayed and that Wenceslas is about to marry Hortense, Bette's young niece, the 'poor cousin' sets up a plot to destroy her entire family by exploiting their weaknesses.  Credits: Director, Yves-Andre Hubert ; writers, Jean-Louis Bory ' photography, Rene Mathelin ; music, Dominique  Paladilhe. Cast: Alice Sapritch, Daniele Lebrun, Jean Sobieski, Elina Labourdette, Jacques Castelot, Claudine Coster, Jacques Monod.
